comments.raw_text:
Step: 
1. Switch to day view and make minimonth visible
2. Press on keyboard PageDown
3. Press on keyboard PageUp
4. Repeat step 2 and 3 for different view (week, multiweek, month)

Expected result: 

1.Day view is selected and minimonth shows selected day 
2.Main view and minimonth shows next day 
3.Main view and minimonth shows previous day 
(like above but skips one week, groups of weeks or month)

Actual result: PageDown/PageUp is not working at all. This function was working before in Lightning early builds, but not on Lightnight 1.0b7
comments.creator: yang.chen@oracle.com
comments.author: yang.chen@oracle.com

comments.raw_text:
Page up/down don't work in 1.0b5rc3 either (TB 5.0).

If I select a mailbox in the folder pane then switch to the calendar tab (month view) and press page up/down, it incorrectly affects the mail tab.
comments.creator: mozilla@sprosh.com
comments.text:
Page up/down don't work in 1.0b5rc3 either (TB 5.0).

If I select a mailbox in the folder pane then switch to the calendar tab (month view) and press page up/down, it incorrectly affects the mail tab.
comments.author: mozilla@sprosh.com

comments.raw_text: Reproduced on Lightning 1.9, page up/page down still not working in 1.9.
